name: Breadstick Twists
steps: Let dough rise until doubled. Take half the dough, roll out and cut into strips.
Take a strip and double it into a twist. Take twist and dip in melted butter.
Place on cookie sheet. Pour the additional butter over the twists. Sprinkle with garlic salt. Season salt and parmesan cheese to taste. Let rise again then bake.
Bake at 350 until golden brown on the top.
